Name: Module
Description: An attachment to TrainingManager, this class holds 6 callbacks run in the training process. These callbacks are overwritten by subclasses

Functions.Name: startOfQue

MandatoryArgs.Name: saveDirectory
MandatoryArgs.Description: The directory where stuff should be saved.

Functions.Description: Is called at the beginning of the training que.

Functions.Name: startOfEpisode

MandatoryArgs.Name: episodeIndex
MandatoryArgs.Description: Index of the episode. Used for referring to TrainingEpisode generation parameters.

Functions.Description: Is called at the beginning of each TrainingEpisode run.

Functions.Name: endOfIteration

MandatoryArgs.Name: trainingError
MandatoryArgs.Description: The error on the training batch.

MandatoryArgs.Name: iterationTime
MandatoryArgs.Description: The time taken for the training.

Functions.Description: Is called at the end of each training iteration.

Functions.Name: endOfCrossVal
Functions.Description: Is called at end of cross validation.

Functions.Name: endOfEpisode
Functions.Description: Is called at the end of each TrainingEpisode run.

Functions.Name: endOfQue
Functions.Description: Is called at the end of the training que.

Notes: Each function is called at different stages of the training by the TrainingManager. The functions can be overwritten to create different functionality.
